text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/Virb4xKzw5

On Sunday 28 March, 3,862 new cases and 19 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the #UK.

30,151,287 people have received the 1st dose of a #vaccine, and 3,527,481 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/LFyCpntu6q
